comments:
Annie's unit is a very comfortable, convenient place to enjoy a Sydney beachside holiday. The description and pictures are accurate and communication was always prompt. The flat is only a studio space, but the kitchen is fully equipped, as is the bathroom/laundry.
There was torrential rain for most of our holiday, which limited our access to the balcony and the expansive rooftop common space, with its ocean views to Clovelly.
Still, we were snug and comfortable and didn't want for anything in the unit itself. It is at the back of the block and quiet, but close to cafes convenience stores and transport.
We would be happy to return there, and to recommend it to others.

My partner and I stayed here for an extended long weekend trip and loved it. Great central location and was so easy to get around from here, clean and tidy with a super comfy bed, warm, fast and clear communication‚Ä¶ was perfect! Thank you Peter and Stephanie x
Smooth check in and close drive to the Vietnamese town
Clean and practicle. Well equipped.
Great place, very clean and in a nice area.

Claire‚Äôs place was a wonderful place to base ourselves over a long weekend. The apartment is private with a great courtyard, which was really handy to dry towels and beach gear since it‚Äôs walking distance to the beach! The bed was comfortable and the kitchen was equipped with everything we needed. Claire was an incredibly hospitable host, helpful, and always quick to respond to any questions we had. We could not have found a better spot! Thank you so much Claire and Greta!

This place was in a perfect location, the rooms were beautiful and comfortable and the staff were so helpful. Late check in after hours was a breeze and the free drinks voucher was a welcome surprise. Such great value for money! I would definitely stay here again.
Great, clean place and close to shops.
we loved our stay here. the host was very accommodating and all round was very impressed
Un lugar perfecto para pasar unos d√≠as maravillosos al lado de la.playa. El.departamento es c√≥modo y cuenta con lo necesario para poder cocinar y estar c√≥modo.
very nice place,and clean,highly recomended,very comfortable place thanknyou.
Zach was very helpful and friendly, quick to respond to our messages, it was a great location.
Fantastic location, suited our needs perfectly
Great location and incredibly tidy apartment. Only thing which would be nice is a higher water pressure in the shower.
Fantastic place to stay, only a couple blocks back from Bondi beach. Quiet, clean and very comfortable.

Ken's place is spacious, comfortable and very clean. It met all our expectations and in a great location to where we needed to go.
The house is modern and has everything you need to feel like you're at home. Would definitely recommend to stay here and we look forward to staying here again in the future.
Ken and his wife were very friendly and quick response to all our requested. Location is closed to our work destination, will definitely stay again next time in town for business. Highly recommended
Stephen was a great host. Always on hand with any advice and very quick responding. Loved our stay at his apartment! Couldn‚Äôt have asked for any more.
Easy access, clean and tidy.  A good stay.

Great little house right near the beach and only a short walk to Avalon shops. Suitable for a short stay for a couple.

Very clean and well appointed with everything you‚Äôd need for a mini break.
Great place to stay, friendly and helpful host.

Excellent location between CBD and Bondi Beach. Good quality furniture and excellent bakery downstairs.
We highly recommend Marks‚Äô apartment.
The location is exceptional if you aim to hop between the city and the beach

Ken and his wife responded very quickly to any messages before our stay and with requests we made after arrival, yet we only ever saw and heard them when we needed them. And we got to experience life in Cabramatta, which is a part of Sydney not many "tourists" get to visit.
Fantastic
Fantastic place in great location and pet friendly! Love it we will be back!!
A hidden little gem with great hosts that have put their personal touch into making your stay a fabulous one! Stylish,  clean accommodation and most importantly a short walk into Manly!!

It was very nice to stay two weeks by Marcela. The flat war nice and clean and near to the beach. I allways eat my breakfast on the balconary. Short bus trip to city. Marcela helps me when i have questions about activities in Sydney.
Thank you for the nice time.
Great location and facilities!
Gute Unterkunft, perfekt
Great location, clean and tidy room
Good communication, place was nice and clean.

Derek is too busy to be a host. A lovely , roomy but poorly maintained cottage. Large kitchen with missing knobs off drawers and badly aligned cupboards . We had trouble with TV which was eventually fixed.
Main bedroom large and comfortable.
Very clean and such great interiors. Perfect location - very close to Kings Cross station, the best if you're looking to spend some time in Sydney city.
Great

Sian's home was absolutely perfect for our vacation in Sydney! The location is perfect to check out the beaches and easy to hop on the train to the city center. We had a bit of hiccup in our plans and needed to come early, Sian worked with us to make it hassle -free. The home was clean and exactly as advertised. Thanks for hosting us!
Really enjoyed our stay here! The place was so much nicer than we expected. It was very spacious for three people, with excellent cooking utilities for breakfast, lunch and dinners!

Derek's place is in a great location, very close to great cafes and restaurants and close to public transport. It is a beautiful old house with stained glass windows, but does need a bit of love and attention, with quite a few broken items. There was a very bad damp smell and leak in the kitchen that we needed to notify Derek about and after a couple of days a plumber came and fixed it, leaving a gap in the kickboard which hopefully has now been fixed. Very basic kitchen supplies, but if you aren't planning on eating in then not a problem. Also no hairdryer although listed in the amenities, so bring your own! The kids did enjoy the pool and the spa bath.
Great place

Stephanie and Peter's place was great. Communication was super quick and responsive, easy access and exactly as described. They had provided little touches throughout which were so convenient such as powerboards, stationary, milk, tea, and more! Made it so easy to walk in and settle down.

Having lived in Darlinghurst for many years the location was perfect - close access to everything. It is close to a main road so there is a little road noise during the day which only affected me on the days I was working from the apartment, however you can close the windows and turn the AC on (extra bonus!) and it's much less noticeable.

I'd definitely recommend their place to stay! Thanks for a great stay.

While we only had a quick stay at Ken‚Äôs place, it suited us for what we needed.
Would also be perfect for longer stays, as offers a great kitchen with stove/oven as well as washing machine.
Great communication on Ken‚Äôs part as well made our stay easy and stress free.

Loved this place. Great quiet spot in Bronte but with a bunch of good cafes and restaurants downstairs. Wifi was great - I was working with lots of zoom calls and it worked perfectly. Great little patio. Host was really helpful and responsive.
Has everything you could possibly need and a great location. Super cozy and spacious enough for 2 to relax. Thanks!
Great staying here, Aaron was lovely and answered all our questions. Would definitely stay again :)
Awesome location and Stephen is a very attentive host.
Great stay. Perfect location and a lovely place. Easy check in and very helpful host.

Read the place descriptions carefully. the third bed is a pull out bed in the living room. All good if you only need it for sleeping. It is a new build with Easy access place to stay. Communication was quick and efficient.

L'appartement est situ√© dans le quartier tr√®s agr√©able de Paddington, et tr√®s bien desservi par les transports en commun. L'appartement en lui-m√™me est spacieux, meubl√© et d√©cor√© avec go√ªt. Notre h√¥te Mark est tr√®s sympathique, accueillant et r√©actif. Nous n'h√©siterons pas √† revenir, tant notre s√©jour nous a plu.
Place was perfect and nice a clean
Amazing place!
Great place to stay.
Super nice staff, lovely place and a warm environment!
Great hospitality. Ken kept it clean and everything we needed was there.
Great location. Beach less than 5 mins walk. Clean, spacious, well equiped 2 bedroom unit. Bonus is sea views from balcony.
clean & tidy, cosy & enjoyable place to stay at
Great place to visit! very enjoyable experience.
Excellent location and size, with added bonus of checking in via the hotel. Room is very private and balcony is great.
Loved Andrew‚Äôs place. Had everything you needed and was so close to the heart of Bondi. Will definitely book again!
Very nice and clean unit with modern touches. Value for money. Better than expected. Thanks for great experience and comfy stay

Alzbeta's studio is well look after, spacious and tastefully crafted. Clean yet cozy. Kitchen is well-equiped with nice setting. I enjoy the proximity to local amenities and various food choices. Alzbeta has been great with communication and a pleasure to meet in person. This is one great little studio that I would stay again. Many thanks!
Very clean and great place to stay in
Very clean and  new!!
The host canceled this reservation 40 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This airbnb location is the best! It's cosy and stylish at the same time. It's well located near the ocean, the warf and the center of Manly. And still quiet, I slept very well here. The garden is great, breakfast in the sun.. I enjoyed staying here a lot. Claire and Greta were great hosts, very helpfull.

Fabulous place to stay whilst visiting Manly. A home away from home with cooking facilities, washing machine, clothes line and very comfortable queen bed. The starting food items left for us were very much appreciated. Manly is a fabulous place to visit and Claire‚Äôs home located in a lovely neighbourhood topped off our experience.
Fabulous as always. Thanks Mark!

Great find for an affordable one night stay! Two bedrooms were the perfect space for us and our two year old son. Kitchen facilities were also very useful. Booking, check in and check out were all simple. Handy spot, tucked away in a quiet street, with food and convenience options only a short walk away.

It was a nice place to stay the room was clean and the shared bathrooms were kept a lot nicer than other shared washrooms. The location was pretty good as it is near grocery stores and Kings Cross. However, I would suggest going elsewhere (outside of Potts Point) for food as the food is overpriced and not that good. Also, be careful going out at night as Potts Point becomes a lot more sketchy. Overall I definitely recommend staying at the Jensen.
Good location, great cleanliness, excellent service and communication. Highly recommended!

Emma's place was a great sized family home. The outdoor area with the pool was great! The location was a walk to North Avalon beach and a 15 min walk to the main Avalon village. We all had a great stay! Thank you Emma!

Great place. Stocked with everything you can think of needing. Stephanie and Peter were quick and helpful. Wifi was poor. At most got 10 Mbps, usually 5 or less. Would have been ok if it hadn't cut out completely from time to time as well.

The host Ken was great to communicate with, answered my queries promptly.  The location was equi-distance to the two places I was interested in (about 7-9 minutes driving), they being Liverpool and Cabramatta, so that was perfect for me.  It was also good to be able to park my car on-site rather than on the kerb.

Andrew is a fantastic host - so helpful and attentive. The apartment is in the perfect location, it in a quiet street yet only a short walk to the beach and shops. It is everything you'd need for a short or lengthy stay. Would recommend.
Great stay, would go again anytime
Another great stay at the Jensen.

Very quick to respond, great place to stay. Friendly environment especially with our 21month old son. Clean beddings and towels. Ken even extended one more night for us on the spot when we requested.
My only feedback would be breakfast isn‚Äôt really breakfast, it‚Äôs packets of snacks.
We had to buy our own breakfast each day. Otherwise, excellent service and stay.
great stay!

This is a roomy place and an easy stroll to Haberfield's village with its Italian providores and some great restaurants, including the Insta-famous Happyfield.  For us, it turned out not to be a great choice, however if you are not going to be cooking, have a dog small enough not to jump out or be let out in error onto a busy road, and don't need a lot of privacy it could be comfortable.  Seemingly lots of others have been.  As the previous reviewer mentioned, it is in need of some TLC to be safe and equipped as expected, and as per the last reviewer, the owner did fix a few problems but this all took quite a while and a lot of liasing on my part.  In the end I felt they were annoyed when I reported errant wiring in the cooker and a gas leak - the owner is a very busy man but I too have better things to do.  The dishwasher has still not been properly fixed, still no hairdryer, a nine day wait for the oven to be cleaned and usable.  TV is very old, no catch-up or Netflix if you are staying a while as we were.  Owner apologised for the lack of the advertised work desk I needed and after a while supplied one, filthy from being outside, literally dripping in cobwebs and which was excellent after I spent an hour cleaning it and killing the 27 spiders (I counted...) that had made it home.  Just to give you the gist.  We feel safer and happier in our new AirBnB.
Very good apartment... super clean and confortable! Thanks
Good house and nice host...
Convenient and nice place to stay

We had the perfect stay at Alzbeta‚Äôs house, extremely comfortable and really good location. The house is small but so luminous, beautiful and functional - it was more than enough for 2 people for a week. We had everything from shampoos to hangers, abundance of towels, kitchen supplies etc. The bed was comfortable and the house was spotless clean. Alzbeta was responsive, she let us early check in and introduced us around, she was super sweet. The location is perfect; quiet, safe, so many restaurants and cafes around, really close to metro station and a close uber ride to almost everywhere (like the opera house or bondi beach). We‚Äôd definitely stay at her place again and I‚Äôd recommend to everyone.
An amazing property well appointed and hosts very lovely
The Jensen was a clean and cozy place to live
Great location, very clean facilities, friendly and helpful staff - really good value for money. I‚Äôd be happy to stay there again.

Peter & Stephanie's place is just like those pictures shown.  The room is bright and equipped with all necessary things.  Their instuction for checking in is quite clear and easy understanding.  The location is also good.  There are many good restaurants nearby.
Beautiful place- the balcony and communal terrace are lovely, as is annies furnishing
This little granny flat was clean and sufficient. Great value for money.

Great location, spacious and tidy.
We all mentioned how comfortable the beds were.
Derek was friendly, communicated well and willing to make our stay enjoyable.
Perfect for our weekend travelling for Rugby at Concord.
Would certainly return and recommend to friends and family
Definitely worth every single penny

Duffotel is a unique and special place. We loved the light filled living area, which was full of character. It is up one marble flight, which was no problem. The wall of glass louvres gave good cross breeze. The contemporary kitchen had absolutely everything we needed. We enjoyed barbecues up on the roof with views to the harbour bridge.
Mark and Jennifer were thoughtful hosts, friendly and quick to respond to queries, and very informative about the area. We highly recommend Duffotel for a Paddington stay.

The Jensen is an excellent choice for an affordable stay in Potts Point! The location is central & the staff are very friendly & always willing to help. I would definitely stay again  & recommend this place to friends.

Exactly what we hoped, a beautiful cottage moments away from the beach. Cosy, very clean and perfect for a weekend beach getaway. Jill was very responsive both prior to our stay as well as during. Highly recommended.
100% recommend! This is a very clean well decorated place.
Apartment is excellent and very conveniently located.
Everything perfect. Clean, near from supermakert and bondi beach. Stephen was always attentive.
Nice place to stay. Thank you Ken

Could be a bit loud in the mornings depending on your room and desire to sleep in due to local restaurants etc but otherwise a great value stay in an amazingly convenient location. Don‚Äôt be worried about the shared bathroom, always clean and almost never occupied. The room was spacious, clean and very comfortable

Great place in central Manly, only 5-10 min walk to beach and ferry. We had some issues with moist in the bedroom, however this was most likely due to the extreme weather conditions at the time. Claire was a great host and very responsive!
Quick and easy check in - good little place to stay.
Beachcomber is a lovely studio in such a great location. Less than 5 mins to the beach and an easy walk into Avalon, or short drive to whale/palm beach. Would highly recommend Jill‚Äôs place!
Good location, nice house
Great accommodation I would definitely book there again. üëçüèΩ
Loved everything during our stay and the place was just superb.
Very cute place with a good location

Beautiful home.
Enjoyed our stay.
Great Host, very flexible and accommodating.
The property was beautiful, light and airy. A gorgeous patio and short walk to the beach and town.
Nice place to stay, would stay again
I booked Alzbeta‚Äôs place on behalf of another traveler for work. We had no issues and Alzbeta‚Äôs communication was clear and prompt.
Very clean and well appointed.
Great service, convenient place, super nice place, super clean and super host.
Amazing! Exceeded all my expectations

Comfortable stay however missing a lot of kitchen equipment (didn‚Äôt have detergent, dish cloths, cooking utensils). The staff were very attentive and provided us with these when we asked. The building smelt quite badly of cigarette smoke each time we walked out which was a shame and quite unpleasant.
Pretty good place, close to ct and good environment

We had a fantastic time in Bondi and staying at Stephen's pad made it more worthwhile. Besides being located a few meters from the beach... gym, bus stops, eateries and supermarkets were all less than a 5min walk away. Stephen was a legend being just a text away if we needed any help. Top notch and friendly guy! We'll be back fosho!
Ken‚Äôs place is great, easy access, clean and very comfortable. Highly recommend
Great host and excellent communication
Very stylish/comfortable stay. Highly recommend!

This place is everything you could hope for and more. Zach & his housemate were amazing, thoughtful and kind. The location is perfect for access to Olympic Park. It is  modern and clean. I would definitely stay here again!

It‚Äôs a nice environment, if you don‚Äôt mind staying in shared environment.
Not noisy, and is comfortable. Very nicely stocked, lovely host. Nice shopping centres nearby and markets.
Cosy little place in a great location. Close to Bondi beach and shops. Good amenities and the bed was really comfortable!!
Great location and spot. Ideal for solo travelers
A great location, less than 10 minute walk to the beach and ferry. Also nice to have a shared small garden and private entrance.

Kens place will hopefully make a great place to saty but its brand new and our experience had prblems    No fridge it had been doscovered broke that morning this is ion the day after Sydney experienced 47 degress so we lost food and drink   Cockroaches 4 in number throught the night and a big spider   so needs pest conrtol and a tidy up of the boxes and builders rubble outsde tahts attaracting pests.  Once thats done it will be fine
DOUBLE TRIPLE CHECK YOUR BOOKING WITH THEM

I stayed here with a friend. The compact room was larger than I expected. The shared bathroom was a better experience than expected. The bed was very comfortable as well. Overall we really enjoyed our stay.
Spacious, clean place. Nice quiet neighborhood. About 1 hr from the airport at the height of Sydney traffic. Otherwise it was a great one night stay.
Absolutely stunning design and period features mixed with modern ammenties and appliances. Wondeful location and great value for money AirBnB. Highly recommend!
Exactly what was in the description.
Really love this place! Such a gem!
very good
Lovely host and a beautiful cosy room to stay, will definitely come back and also recommend
Great stop-over. Nice and clean.
nice abd clean
Well suited studio in the heart of Bronte, clean and well maintained. Perfect spot for a city trip!
Great location for access to the to do places and see in Sydney. Well kept facility. A clean and inviting space
Great space for big family

Perfect apartment for a couple. Great location only 5min walk to the beach as well as to the Manly ferry that takes you into central Sydney. Near to all the local bars, restaurants, coffee shops and supermarket but in a quiet location with a lovely garden. Hosts were fantastic with many nice touches including use of herbs and chillis from the garden as well as providing many essentials like milk and tea bags etc. Flexible and easy check in / out as well as lots of tips on where to go in Manly. We look forward to staying here again in the future!
Very noice
good

What can I say this place has it all.
Great spot. Value for money. Quiet. Sparkling and I must say that everything is supplied.
Love the idea of bulk bathroom products in all the bathrooms.
The people were outstanding and I will be booking every time I am in Sydney.
Great place. I‚Äôll come back next time
Very quaint accommodation, perfect location and Easy access so close to beach and local shops
Great stay for my one night transitioning through Sydney. Close to restaurants and bars. Room and bathroom were both clean and bed was comfortable!
We simply loved it!!!

Stephen is a great host!  His communication is strong and kept us well informed throughout the process even whilst being overseas for work.  He was really hospitable and kind to my family and myself, and the location was prime living for Bondi.  Thanks again, Stephen, we really appreciate all your hospitality and support!

What a cozy boutique hotel! The room was fantastic. The shared bathroom/toilet was immaculately clean. Jordan, Andrea and Jordan at the front desk were a pleasure to chat to and super sweet!
The location is pretty central - we parked ourselves in a Wilson car park in the city and walked around to the hotel, CBD, Circular Quay, Rocks etc over the long weekend.
Excellent value for money.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Second year staying here. Perfect place for what we needed while in sydney.
Great host, great location and very comfortable room. Many thanks.
Really nice flat in a secluded area, yet moments from the beach. Host was very friendly and communicative. Would happily stay there again when I get back to Sydney.

A great place to stay if you want to be close to the CBD and everything Potts Point has to offer. If you need a dedicated workspace recommend making that clear when you book. The building is lovely and the rooms are clean and comfortable. The staff are friendly and helpful, a big thanks to Cynthia, Bobby and Aaron for making the long stay feel like 'home'.
Was very approachable and the host was very understanding. Very happy with the price and location was just what we expected. Would visit soon.
Nice place to stay
This listing was perfect for what we needed. It was clean, great location and easily accessible.
Great location and fabulous space for the family and our dog.

perfect for a long weekend in sydney

great location, small room with shared bathroom but absolutely fine if you are a couple coming for a few nights!

We really enjoyed our stay at Sian‚Äôs place. It is in a very handy location, tastefully decorated & very clean. Sian was very responsive & accommodating.  Recommend to other travellers needing a central location with public transport & eateries nearby

A very comfortable stay as always, thanks Mark! Will always book into Duffotel when we stay in Paddington as it‚Äôs a wonderfully convenient location, has everything we need with a superb cafe downstairs for delicious French inspired food. Highly recommend! See you again soon, cheers Juliet and Toby üòä
